alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, north central Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orange Springs, or 7 miles southwest of Interlachen, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Hawthorne, Orange Springs, Hog Valley, Johnson, Lochloosa and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam
